articles.title: Emi Martinez makes Lionel Messi swap claim as Argentina conversation revealed
articles.description: Latest Aston Villa news from BirminghamLive as goalkeeper Emi Martinez talks about playing with Lionel Messi and what the legendary player told him while on international duty with Argentina
articles.content:
Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez has revealed that Lionel Messi would swap all seven of his Ballon d'Or awards for one Copa America winners' medal.
Messi told Martinez as much while the duo were on international duty with Argentina, saying success... [1643 chars]

articles.title: Teenager cycles more than 32,000km from Alaska to Argentina in journey of a lifetime
articles.description: Over the course of nearly one and a half years, teenage cyclist Liam Garner rode through 14 countries, covering more than 32,000km in the journey of a lifetime. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
Over the course of nearly one and a half years, teenage cyclist Liam Garner rode through 14 countries, covering more than 32,000km in the journey of a lifetime.

articles.title: One of the hottest and driest summers in decades for Argentina
articles.description: Heavy rains finally arrived for drought-ridden Argentina, but its a little too late to salvage many crops.
articles.content: Another promising week for drought-ridden Argentina in the third full week of March 2023, week-ending March 25, as heavier rains arrived. According to data from WeatherTrends360, this was the second wettest third full week of March in 30-plus years f... [1778 chars]

articles.title: Retegui scores again as Italy beats Malta 2-0 in qualifying
articles.description: TA’ QALI, Malta (AP) — Argentina-born striker Mateo Retegui is fast becoming the center forward Italy has been sorely lacking.
articles.content:
TA’ QALI, Malta (AP) — Argentina-born striker Mateo Retegui is fast becoming the center forward Italy has been sorely lacking.
Retegui scored again in Italy’s 2-0 win over Malta on Sunday to make it two goals in as many matches as the defending champ... [1147 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi Honoured as Argentine FA Names Training Complex After PSG Star
articles.description: Argentina's Football Association have honoured their captain Lionel Messi by renaming their training complex after Messi
articles.content:
Argentine football star Lionel Messi was honoured in the town of Ezeiza on the outskirts of Buenos Aires, where the Argentine Football Association (AFA) named its training complex after the national team captain.

articles.title: Argentina FA training facility renamed after Lionel Messi
articles.description: The Casa de Ezeiza in Buenos Aires, which houses the national team set-up, will now be known as Lionel Andres Messi "in tribute to the best player in the world", AFA president Claudio Tapia wrote on Twitter.
articles.content:
The Argentina national team’s training facility has been renamed after talismanic captain Lionel Messi in recognition of his World Cup heroics and star-studded career, the country’s football association (AFA) said on Saturday.
The Casa de Ezeiza in B... [1267 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Argentina FA training facility renamed after Messi
articles.description: The Casa de Ezeiza in Buenos Aires, which houses the national team set-up, will now be known as Lionel Andres Messi "in tribute to the best player in the world", AFA president Claudio Tapia wrote on Twitter. "Welcome to the world champion's house," Tapia said at the unveiling ceremony attended by current and former Argentina players.
